Make sure you update MacID for OS X!

New stuff:
• Adds support for MacID for Pebble. Visit macid.co/pebble to download MacID for Pebble for free.
• Adds a pressure sensitive Settings button. Try it out if you have a 6S or 6S Plus!

Make sure you update MacID for OS X!

New stuff:
• Adds support for MacID for Pebble. Visit macid.co/pebble to download MacID for Pebble for free.
• Adds a pressure sensitive Settings button. Try it out if you have a 6S or 6S Plus!
• Adds s

New stuff in MacID 1.3.3:
- Adds support for switching between multiple Apple Watches in iOS 9.3 and watchOS 2.2
- For Proximity Wake, MacID for iOS will automatically launch MacID for Pebble, and will automatically close it after you've unlocked yo

New stuff in MacID 1.3.3:
- Adds support for switching between multiple Apple Watches in iOS 9.3 and watchOS 2.2
- For Proximity Wake, MacID for iOS will automatically launch MacID for Pebble, and will automatically close it after you've unlocked yo

All of MacID is designed, developed and maintained by one person, Kane Cheshire.
I'll never hassle you in the app but if you could take a moment to leave/update a review in the App Store I would be eternally grateful, it really does help independent de

Hello! MacID v1.3.5 has a few tweaks and fixes for iOS 10, watchOS 3 and macOS Sierra.
If you have a moment spare I would *really* appreciate it if you leave or update a review in the App Store. Each update clears the rating from search results :( Tha

Hello! MacID v1.3.5 has a few tweaks and fixes for iOS 10, watchOS 3 and macOS Sierra.
If you have a moment spare I would *really* appreciate it if you leave or update a review in the App Store. Each update clears the rating from search results :( Tha
